pages.text: $(li)The Guardian Spine only turns on when receives a nearby redstone signal.$(br)$(li)When a nearby creature or even you step on the Elder Guardian Spine, its walking speed will be considerably reduced and it will receive a damage of 2 heart per second and gives the Mining Fatigue effect, which reduces the mining and attack speed.
$(li)This item only can be dropped by the Elder Guardian.$(br2)Insertar imagen Elder Guardian Spine
